title: Two fonts I need help with.
content:
There are two types of text I'm looking for here. The top and in the info. I appologize if this is really easy, but I am horrible at this and can't seem to make anything look right.

Thank You

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016035530im_/http:/typophile.com/files/signature_4101.png)
author: wallacdu

comments.content: The info looks like Trade Gothic, but I'm not sure about the top.
